                                       java.lang.Class componentClass,

                                       java.lang.String method,
                                       java.util.List<java.lang.String>... itemListForListComponent)
        render the given column by assigning to its cells a component which Class correspond to the given class for Combobox Object you first have to
        Parameters:
        columnName -
        componentClass: - the class of the components category you want to display in the table i.e. Button.class
        serviceClass: - use by reflexion to execute the function having the same name as method argument
        method -
        itemListForListComponent: - i.e. combobox does not have a other Eventhandler as Button

      • applyCellFactoryTo

        void applyCellFactoryTo(TableColumnHelper column,
                        CellFactoryTyp cellFactoryTyp,
                        java.lang.Class converterClazz)
        Apply CellFactory on the given column
        Parameters:
        cellFactoryTyp: - Components category to be display by double click on table cell
        converterClazz: - converter class to be apply on the column. for example if the column will content Integer then you have to apply a IntegerStringConverter
        column: - the the column to apply the cellFactory on

      • applyCellFactoryTo

        void applyCellFactoryTo(CellFactoryTyp cellFactoryTyp,
                        java.lang.String... columns)
        Apply CellFactory on given columns
        Parameters:
        cellFactoryTyp: - Components category to be display by double click on table cell
        converterClazz: - converter class to be apply on the column. for example if the column will content Integer then you have to apply a IntegerStringConverter
        columns: - the list of the column to apply the cellFactory on. if the list is empty or or the given columns name is ALL the it will apply the Factory on all the column

        void performOnEditCommit(java.lang.Class serviceClazz,
                         java.lang.String method)
